title: AG files indictments against damaging statues in Mawanella
content: Colombo  Attorney General Dappula De Livera has requested the Chief Justice to appoint a Trial-at-Bar to try 17 people connected to the incident of causing damage to Buddha Statues in Mawanella in 2018.State Counsel Nishara Jayaratne, the Coordinating Officer to the Attorney General said the AGs Department also filed indictments with the Kegalle High Court against the accused under the provisions of the Prevention of Terrorism Act.
